title: Riot if you are making me pay your fault
body: So my game just crashed as usual after your new beta,and I was just picking the champ,then you gave me a 15 mins punishment for your new beta's daily bug splat?Please this is not only happened to me but also my roommate.So check the daily crush after new beta and also check your mechanism of punishment.If you see this post please at least respond me,best regards!

replies.body:
Since Bugsplats are caused by system driver or hardware issues, it's *extremely unlikely* this issue was caused by the Beta Client. I'd recommend working through our consolidated list of fixes within our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address this.

Let me know if this helped!
Ok,sometimes the bugsplat just pops up during the champ picking,it is not occurring w/e.
